::Axis/Lokk::

	Lokk smacks his head, "Should have known... bah!" then he 
shouts out over the increasing noise, "Entering atmosphere now. 
This time, Seekker, put you seat belt on." He grips the steering 
controls, and begins the almost impossible task of steering a 
careening space vehicle throught the atmosphere. Axis moans 
from behind, "I don't feels so well..." Lokk smacks his head again.


On 23 Apr 2001, at 4:42, gunthers8@... wrote:

> ::Seekker::
> Seekker flies face first into the empty seat from a result of the 
> increased speed.
> "The bottle said 'Fix It SUPER GLUE' so why shouldn't it fix 
> it..super...hahahahahaha"
>
